Background: below are the common steps for each scenario. # Features/Customer.feature:3 INFO [main] (Steps.java:27)- ****Launching browser**** Given User launch chrome browser # Steps.user_launch_chrome_browser() INFO [main] (Steps.java:36)- ****Opening URL**** When User open Url "https://admin-demo.nopcommerce.com/login" # Steps.user_open_Url(String) INFO [main] (Steps.java:43)- ****Providing login details**** And Users Enter email as "admin@yourstore.com" and password as "admin" # Steps.users_Enter_email_as_and_password_as(String,String) INFO [main] (Steps.java:50)- ****Started Login**** And click on login # Steps.click_on_login() Then user can view Dashboard # Steps.user_can_view_Dashboard()
